snippet: Judge Thokozile Matilda Masipa allowed an appeal against the athlete’s acquittal on murder charges, but not against his five-year sentence.
abstract: South African prosecutors win right to appeal acquittal of Oscar Pistorius on charges of murdering girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Judge Thokozile Matilda Masipa allowed an appeal against the athlete’s acquittal on murder charges, but not against his five-year sentence.

headline.main: Oscar Pistorius Verdict Can Be Appealed, Judge Says
headline.print_headline: Judge Allows Appeal of Pistorius Verdict
